This example uses knitr kable for additional table formatting.

```{r}
df <- data.frame(date = c('Aug 20, 2024', 'Aug 12, 2024', 'Aug 2, 2024', 'Aug 1, 2024', 'Eric', 'Frank'),
                 title = c('A', 'B', 'B', 'B', 'B', 'A'),
                 author = c(1, 2, 2, 1, 0, 0))

#view data frame
knitr::kable(df[1:6, ], )
```
